= Vim-Wiki =

=== Key bindings ===

===== Wiki =====

*<Leader>ww* Open default wiki file
<Leader>wt Open default wiki file in new tab
<Enter> Follow/Create wiki link
<Shift-Enter> Split and Follow/Create wiki link
<Backspace> Go back to previous wiki link
<Tab> Find next wiki link
<Shift-Tab> Find previous wiki link

===== Diary =====

<Leader> w <Leader> w Open today's diary file
<Leader> wi Open diary index for wiki
<Leader> w <Leader> i Update current diary index
